page.title: 15CHILDREN IN BICESTER
page.content: HOME LIFE:My name is Sarah.I live in a modern, 3 bedroomed, detached house with my mother, father and little brother.I go to school every day at 9 o'clock and finish at 3 o'clock.At weekends I go to dancing class and have music lessons.My favourite food is steak.My favourite games are tig and stick-in-the-mud. PLAY GROUPS:There are many play groups in the town.These are set up by the various housing estates and organised and run by volunteers. HOLIDAYS:Bicester is a long way from the coast.The nearest seaside is Bournmouth.So, many children rarely get to the seaside.Every summer, the Round Table Organisation takes disadvantaged children away for a week.
